item.title: Ukraine's Military Is Using Unmanned Ground Robots That Could Change Warfare - bgr.com
item.description: Ukraine’s Military Is Using Unmanned Ground Robots That Could Change Warfare bgr.comHow Drone Engineers are Helping Robotize the Military UkrinformUkrainian soldiers surprised a robot maker by using a drone to drop one of its bots into battle Business InsiderUkraine’s robot machine gunner held off Russia for six weeks The TelegraphUkrainian servicemen operate an unmanned ground vehicle fit for delivery missions on the frontline in Donetsk region&nbsp…
